title: Tomato soup with vegetables
ingredients: ['25g butter or 2 to 3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion or spring onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, chopped', '1 to 2 green chilis, chopped', '1 to 2 pieces root ginger, grated', 'vegetables chopped small, such as green beans, asparagus, broccoli, cabbage leaves, mushrooms, parsnips, swedes, carrots, spinach', '900ml vegetable stock cubes in boiling water', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tin sweetcorn', '1 to 2 pinches dried rosemary, thyme, sage, basil, parsley, (or use fresh if available)', '1 lemon, zested', '1 to 2 pinches salt and pepper', 'beans, such as chickpeas, butter beans, red kidney beans (optional)', 'fresh basil leaves']
